bike.description:
A6-SL custom-butted alloy w/ aero-shaped down tube, hydroformed
top tube, integrated head tube. Rear triangle: A6-SL alloy aero seatstays w/ ride tuned chainstays, forged Track
dropout w/ replaceable stainless axle interface

components.description: FC-770 Fuji straight blade integrated carbon w/ 1 1/8" alloy steerer
Vittoria Rubino Pro Slick, 150 tpi, 700c x 23mm
FSA Orbit CE 1 1/8" integrated w/ alloy top cover
Oval R500 w/ CrMo hollow rails
